description:
--- Price drop for 2 weeks! ---  If there is any coupon you must have, it is this one!  Save up to 65% on many prescriptions.  Use it anywhere nationwide at Walmart, Sam's Club, CVS, Rite Aid, Walgreens, and over 59,000 pharmacies & 95% of independent pharmacies - you can not lose.  Buy it once - Use it forever.

You do not need insurance.  If you have insurance, request a split if your insurance has a higher rate than the coupon offers on one or more drugs.

In 2010, coupon holders saved an average of 45% on an annual basis.

This is not an insurance plan - it is a multi-use coupon that is honored at the pharmacy.  The drug companies and pharmacy want your business and this is one way the earn it - by offering deep discounts on prescriptions.  Anyone can use it REGARDLESS of age or health condition.

This app helps you locate and issues you an immediate id number that can be used the moment you enter your name.  If you are in Walmart right now - this will work right now.  No forms to fill out or pre-qualification is necessary.

Also included is a map locator of participating pharmacies.  

Try Rx Coupon Now!
